thread.title: E. Malone's Expedition Journal - Week One
thread.title_full: E. Malone's Expedition Journal - Week One

title: E. Malone's Expedition Journal - Week One
text: Click images to view larger versions I wonder what else I should bring? An umbrella – Those clouds overhead look ominous. Also, umbrellas are kind of shaped like swords. I wish I had a sword. A compass – The professor’s G.G.P.S. is fancy but delicate. Also, I don’t think he knows how it works. Better have a backup. An umbrella – Those clouds overhead look ominous.
